opennlp.ccg.ngrams
Class SRILM_ScorerMaker

java.lang.Object
  opennlp.ccg.ngrams.SRILM_ScorerMaker
All Implemented Interfaces:
ScorerMaker
Direct Known Subclasses:
SRILM_FactoredScorerMaker
public class SRILM_ScorerMaker
extends Object
implements ScorerMaker

A custom scorer maker that builds and loads standard n-gram models using the SRILM toolkit, which must be separately installed. This class may be subclassed to set different parameters in the constructor, for use in cross-validation tests with the realizer.

Version:
$Revision: 1.10 $, $Date: 2007/12/21 05:13:37 $
Author:
Michael White

prepScorer

public void prepScorer(File tmpDir,
                       int foldNum,
                       File trainFile,
                       File testFile)
                throws IOException
Prepares a scoring model from the training data, by exec-ing the SRILM ngram-count tool with the current options, and computes perplexity on the test data. The training/test data are written to foldN-train.txt and foldN-test.txt, if not already present. The LM file's name is determined by filename(N).

Specified by:
prepScorer in interface ScorerMaker
Throws:
IOException
